page.title: 05INDUSTRIES
page.content: {Daks-Simpson: This is a clothing firm situated between Polbeth and West Calder.They have recently opened a new larger factory near the site of the old factory.In the old factory they employed 146 people.Since opening the new factory they have employed a further 63 people.Daks manufacture ladies and gents trousers in this particular factory,they do not cut out or press the clothes here all that work is done at their main factory in Larkhall. {Other Industries: These are mainly cottage craft industry and come from the Harburn area.These people do not have shops but sell their things at craft fayres etc.They include painting,wood carving,macrami and pyrography.
